div.p: D.E.G. ran simulations and performed analysis. D.E.G., T.J.O’K., D.P.M. and B.G-F. designed and guided the research. D.P.M. assisted with analysis. T.J.O’K. developed and provided the large-scale ocean forcing data. J.S.G. provided grids of ice draft and the TIS bathymetry. All authors contributed to the interpretation of results and manuscript preparation.
